means: （用于制作涂料、漆等的）纤维素化合物

word_mean: 纤维素：一种分子式为(C6H10O5)n的碳水化合物，是自然界含量最丰富的多糖，是一种刚性而无分支的长链葡萄糖多聚物，形成大多数植物结构和植物细胞的骨架
它是一种无色透明的固体，不溶于水和酒精等，但溶于Schweitzer试剂

sentence.Network_en: The plant uses the carbohydrates to make cellulose.
sentence.Network_cn: 植物用碳水化合物制造纤维素.

sentence.Network_en: The linear glucan molecules of cellulose are bound together by hydrogen bonds.
sentence.Network_cn: 纤维素中直链葡聚糖分子由氢键连接在一起.

sentence.Network_en: The rejected carbohydrate matter is cellulose and other higher polysaccharides.
sentence.Network_cn: 排泄样的碳水化合物是纤维素和其它较高的多糖.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 纤维素纤维素（cellulose）是由葡萄糖组成的大分子多糖。不溶于水及一般有机溶剂。
有纤维素（cellulose）是由葡萄糖组成的大分子多糖。不溶于水及一般有机溶剂。
40 fungi strains that utilized cellulose as the unique carbon course were gained.以纤维素为唯一碳源对土壤样品进行初筛,得到40株能够分解利用纤维素的真菌菌株。
progress in the studies of cellulose degradation by cellulase ., 纤维素酶降解纤维素机理的研究进展.

Kose (高丝) 雪肌精乳液成分 | CosDNA ... Wheat Germ Oil 小麦胚芽油 Cellulose gum 羧甲基纤维素, ... Citric Acid 柠檬酸.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from French, from cellule ‘small cell’ + -ose

entry.def: Cellulose is a substance that exists in the cell walls of plants and is used to make paper, plastic, and various fabrics and fibres.

means.word_mean: 1. a polysaccharide that is the chief constituent of all plant tissues and fibers

auth_sentence.content: Cellulose is CONVERTED by bacteria and yeast to ethanol.
auth_sentence.res_content: Cellulose is CONVERTED by bacteria and yeast to ethanol.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Cellulose is CONVERTED by bacteria and yeast to ethanol.

auth_sentence.content: So basically cellulose is the key raw material.
auth_sentence.res_content: So basically cellulose is the key raw material.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So basically cellulose is the key raw material.

auth_sentence.content: Ethanol from cellulose is also a bad choice.
